GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v5.15.75
GSD.description:
i2c: designware: Fix handling of real but unexpected device interrupts

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 7fa5304c4b5b425d4a0b3acf10139a7f6108a85f, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit c7b79a75287141cef5bbaeaf1c942269c08cd52e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: i2c: designware: Fix handling of real but unexpected device interrupts
